description: Audit your computer login times. Time, date, total logins in days, local or remote, sidelonglogin. 30 days demo. Note: Copy 'loginTimer.exe' from 'C:\ProgramData\chocolatey\lib\loginTimer\tools' and paste in any private directory than system drive eg: d:\my private\loginTimer.exe. Right click 'Run as Administrator' for activation or change path. Official websites: https://logintimer.weebly.com http://www.softcleaner.in
summary: Did you think about your computer last login Times and Dates?
author: satheeshsoft
